name: Softros Systems
overview:
Softros Systems specializes in developing network applications for medium to large scale companies. We conduct multiple researches on applications usability in attempt to constantly improve performance, the mission-critical factor for modern businesses. Technology research programs conducted in tight co-operation with leading IT-specialists allowed us to transit from complicated server-based application models to much more promising and adoptable interconnectivity model.

Our software products: 1) Softros LAN Messenger - Instant messaging software for corporate networks. 2) Network Time System - Network-wide time maintenance system. 3) LogonExpert - Secure approach to Windows automatic logon.

Customers include some of the world’s largest companies as Siemens, Walt Disney, Hilton, YKK, Toshiba Japan, SHI, Sanyo, Carrier Corp, UMB Financial Corp, Blizzard Entertainment, General Electric, BAE Systems and Lockheed Martin.
